--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Torca:::
> 
> Torca: Don't worry about it.  We'll make sure nobody persecutes you 
for being 
> related to Starscream.

::REDHOT::

    For the first time since he was rescued by Beachcomber, Redhot 
looked depressed.
    "Paaa..I believe..your..words..are true...but I have been 
hunted...far too..long." he sighed, head lowered. He absent mindedly 
played with a rock digging into the heel of his foot. He looked up at 
Torca.
    "I hope.. I can... protect you..when the time comes."

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
